summary: This is an email from June 27, 2019, discussing the list of victims identified in the side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) for Jeffrey Epstein. The sender notes that their principal New York victim is not on the list, which appears to contain only Florida victims, and the email is copied to the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Identification of Victims in NPA Side-Letter
events.description: The document references a list of victims contained in a side-letter to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) for Jeffrey Epstein, and notes that the principal New York victim known to the sender is not included on that list.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: A side-letter to Jeffrey Epstein's Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) contained a list of victims.
The list of victims in the side-letter appears to contain only victims from Florida.
The sender's principal New York victim is confirmed not to be on the list from the NPA side-letter.
The correspondence involves the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
